reviewText: Good film! It is based on one of my favourite books and it follows the story brilliantly.
Good quality and is not easy to find this movie, I'm happy with my buy it is a present for my dad who was looking for this movie for a long time.

This may indeed be a bootleg because even though the DVD includes a menu with links to subtitles, there are none, not even in Spanish!  The back of the case says there are other features as well, but there are none.  I bought the movie because I enjoyed the novel in English so much.  I gave it 3 stars because it looks like a very thoughtful and well-acted movie.
The copy of the video seems bootleg. It does not cover the entire screen and is very pixelated. Fantastic Spanish film, but the quality of the DVD is very low.
